title: Corki players on boards, do *not* disenchant Red Baron or Ice Toboggan skin shard

embed.description: r/CorkiMains: A subreddit for all Corki mains from League of Legends. Feel free to discuss builds, plays, art, etc. anything related to Corki.

body:
I have come to reduce the number of regrets when the eventual Corki VGU does happen, so here is a proof that Corki's skin will get *proper* legendary treatment and not Alien Invader Heimer and Firefighter Tristana treatment. 

Keep these shards because they will be worth it in few years.
